title: Launch Facebook Ad Campaign
description: A media buyer needs to set up and launch a new ad campaign on Facebook targeting a specific audience.

tasks.description: Create a new campaign in the ad platform with the objective of 'Lead Generation'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets up the campaign shell with the right objective.

tasks.description: Define the target audience based on demographics (age, location) and interests (e.g., 'hiking').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a correctly targeted audience for the ad set.

tasks.description: Upload the ad creative (image and copy) and set the daily budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads the assets and sets the budget.
The campaign is set to 'Active' and begins delivery.
